___i18n.description: Which locale to use for displaying this widget.

___locale.description: The topic under which to expect the locale for this widget.

___buttons.description: A list of buttons to be displayed next to the headline, each with individual action and other properties.

___busyOn.description: List of flags. Setting any of these causes the button (icon) to indicate a busy state, unsetting any reverses the effect.

items.description: Flag topic. Prefixing the topic with '!' inverts its meaning.

___action.description: Topic name of the action to request taking upon button activation.

___hideOn.description: List of flags. Setting any of these causes the button to be hidden from view, unsetting any reverses the effect. Space for the button is reserved in either state.

items.description: Flag topic. Prefixing the topic with '!' inverts its meaning.

___align.description: The position relative to the headline.

___disableOn.description: List of flags. Setting any of these causes the button to be disabled ('greyed out'), unsetting any reverses the effect.

items.description: Flag topic. Prefixing the topic with '!' inverts its meaning.

___index.description: The position at which the button is inserted.

___accessKey.description: A key (single character) which is used as a shortcut to this button.

___enabled.description: Determines if the button is used at all (true) or ignored completely (false).

___omitOn.description: List of flags. Setting any of these causes the button to be removed from the layout, unsetting any reverses the effect. Other buttons may claim this button's space while it is omitted.

items.description: Flag topic. Prefixing the topic with '!' inverts its meaning.

___class.description: The predefined semantic class that this button belongs to.

___i18nHtmlLabel.description: An (internationalized) HTML label to display on the button.

___size.description: The size of the button on the bar, interpreted according to theme.

___intro.description: Additional introductory HTML text to be shown below the headline.

___headline.description: The HTML text to be shown as a headline.

___level.description: The hierarchical level of the headline (1 to 6).

___buttonArea.description: Additional introductory HTML text to be shown below the headline.

___align.description: The position of the buttons. Either on the left side of the headline or on the right side.

name: laxar-headline-widget
description: Shows a headline, possibly followed by a subtitle and/or buttons.
